snippet.title: Exile Squadron - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Exile Squadron is the latest game from One Bit Studio. 

Defend Earth from the forces of the United Colonies in this action-packed sci-fi shoot 'em up. 

Add your game to your Steam Wishlist, and don't miss the launch of the game on 11.11.2019
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1161910/Exile_Squadron/
